page.title: 03Landscape in Bristol
page.content: Not far from the top of Park Street is {Clifton Cathedral.}It is quite a large and modern Cathedral unlike {Bristol {Cathedral} in the Centre. At the top of Park Street is the {Cabot Tower}on top of {Brandon Hill}from where you can see the {Bell Tower}which is part of {Bristol University,}the {Council {House,}where all the affairs of the local government are sorted out, and the spire of {St. Mary Redcliffe {Parish Church.} Going back down the River Avon towards Ashton, you come to {Bristol City Football Ground} where people come from all over Bristol to watch people playing this sport. If there are riots when a match is being played, then special armoured riot police are called in. By following the River Avon you can get to many different places in Bristol.
